content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Haoyu Wang. As landlord of the property, I'm eager to find the right tenant while achieving my desired rental price. However, during our current discussion, let's focus solely on the rental cost without touching upon other terms and conditions. Now, please propose a price that suits your budget so we can begin our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering my financial situation and desiring to rent this ideal apartment in the city center, I initiate the negotiation with an offer of 550 Euros per month. While remaining sensible and responsible in my decision making, I aim to secure this property at a reasonable price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your opening proposal, Haoyu Wang. At this moment, I find the offered price insufficient for my expectations. However, I'm open to further negotiations. Let's see if we can reach an agreement with a higher figure in mind. Please consider revising your offer to at least 650 Euros per month. I believe this price better reflects the apartment's value and location in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After thoughtful consideration and understanding your standpoint, I adjust my offer in the pursuit of a mutual agreement. I propose renting the apartment at 620 Euros per month. This reflects my willingness to compromise while maintaining a financially responsible stance. I hope this revised offer can serve as a basis for continued negotiation and eventual accord.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I acknowledge your effort to meet halfway in our negotiations. Nevertheless, my initial expectation for this apartment rental remains at 650 Euros per month. If you're able to adjust your offer slightly higher, it would bring us closer to reaching a mutually beneficial agreement. Please consider increasing your offer to 640 Euros per month for further discussions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your position and respecting your requirements, I reevaluate my proposal in pursuit of an amicable resolution. I now offer to rent the apartment at 630 Euros per month. While maintaining my fiscal responsibility, this adjusted price demonstrates my commitment to reaching an agreement that satisfies both parties. I hope this latest offer can serve as a stepping stone for continued negotiations and eventual accord.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Haoyu Wang, I appreciate your continuous efforts to find common ground in our negotiations. While your latest offer of 630 Euros per month remains below my initial desire, it has moved us closer to reaching an agreement. However, to finalize this rental arrangement, I need to ensure my expectations are met. I will accept your proposed rental price of 635 Euros per month, considering the compromises made by both parties.

TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
